comment._content: I believe this transparency must have migrated from another file - the part being assembled in the nose door for a Consolidated C-87 'Liberator Express,' probably taken at Consolidated's Fort Worth plant.

comment._content: That patriotic woman on the right is giving up her right arm for the war effort. And she's happy to do so!
